title: [Jazz festival]
brief_description: Filmed in 1972 at New York’s Lincoln Center Philharmonic Hall, this all-star swing and jazz festival features such giants as Count Basie and his Orchestra, Ella Fitzgerald, Benny Goodman and the Original Quartet, Duke Ellington and his Orchestra, Gene Krupa, the Dave Brubeck Quartet, Teddy Wilson, Joe Williams and Lionel Hampton. Hosted by the great Doc Severinsen the program includes such wonderful jazz classics as “Lady be good”, “Body and soul”, “Take five”, “It don’t mean a thing” and many more, climaxing with a tribute to the late and great Louis “Satchmo” Armstrong. A unique program by unique jazz talents.
